page.title: 06Industries of Staverton
page.content: The Staverton Builders are the largest employers in this block.There are 50 admin. and over 100 site workers contracted for each project on present sites at Reading,Helston and Birmingham.The Offices are situated adjacent to Staverton Bridge and occupy the old flour mill which closed in 1930. Mr.Churchousethe director of Honour Marine told us boats built here of fibre glass and wood are sold to Amerca and the far east .Some 100 people work here which is merged with Staverton Joinery on the same riverside site. Leapfrog Personalised Design Consultants employs 6 people to produce all kinds of giftware for London and abroad. Kingfisher Printing is a family business of two workers producing all sorts of printed matter.
